analysis: The project is a test-website focused on black holes with an incomplete implementation. The HTML file has basic structure but lacks detailed content and interactive elements. The CSS file is missing the full dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The JavaScript file has syntax errors and incomplete functionality for event handlers and animations. The current theme does not fully reflect the black hole topic with bulk animated objects, slides, and pages.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a full dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the theme is cohesive and immersive.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html, including smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
